description:
The single-level home is immediately liveable with untapped possibilities in a quiet yet wonderfully convenient location. It displays character interiors brimming with warmth and charm. The massive open plan living room is a delight with detailed high ceilings.

The kitchen has undergone a recent modern update, so although nothing is pressing to do, it offers plenty of scope for modernisation.

Relax in the open plan living area with the comfort of reverse cycle air-conditioning and gas heating throughout.

At a glance;
- Investors can expect an estimated rental return of $450 per week
- Fully fenced lifestyle, family home with potential
- Traditional brick front fence with tidy Hardiplank home
- Lifestyle location with valuable side lane access and rear lane access to shedding and off-street parking
- A low-maintenance home with the scope to add modern comforts.
- Good storage and generous dimensions
- Soaring ceilings with beautiful detail
- Secure and level grounds
- Positioned within moments from the heart of Lithgow

Please call (02) 6355 2002 to arrange a private inspection.

From all of us at HR Realtors & Lifestyle Property Specialists, we wish you every success in your search for your new property. If you would like more details on this land or to chat about one of the many other properties available, please call or email us today at (02) 6355 2002; we'd love to talk more.

Disclaimer: HR Realtors & Lifestyle Property Specialists believe that all information contained herein be true & correct to the best of our ability & in no way misleading; however, all interested parties are advised to carry out their own enquiries and relevant searches.

The price of this property is listed in Australian Dollars (AUD) at the beginning of this description, which should be used as a price guide for this property.

listers.name: Kristie Trouchet-Nilsson
listers.job_title: Principal L.R.E.A, Stock & Station Agent & C.I.P.S
